name.de: Kommunikation in der Klinik - Dachverband AT

description.en: Configuration for communication in the context of hospitals. Developed by "Dachverband der Wiener Sozialeinrichtungen" in cooperation with the hospital "Klinik Floridsdorf" in Vienna, Austria.
